batchMiscs.name: NL Spa Reine Flat Mineral Water

boilSteps.name: 30g Willamette (green hops), 1g Irish Moss, 1items Wort Chiller

batchYeasts.description: English ale yeast selected for its fast fermentation character and its ability to form a compact sediment at the end of fermentation, helping to improve beer clarity. Recommended for the production of a large range of ales and specially adapted to cask-conditioned ones and fermentation in cylindo-conical tanks.
batchYeasts.name: SafAle English Ale

batchFermentables.name: Wheat Malt
batchFermentables.usedIn: Wheat beers and adjunct for ales up to 40%of grist.

batchHops.name: Willamette (green hops)
batchHops.userNotes: Home grown by The Thirsty Otter
batchHops.notes: Delicate estery/blackcurrant/herbal aroma, some use to replace Fuggle, Willamette is generally perceived as a new, yet good quality aroma hop. The rub of the hops gives an estery/blackcurrant/herbal aroma that is very pleasant but can be quite strong. Some brewers have found it to be a suitable replacement for Fuggle and it also stands up admirably as an aroma variety on its own merits.

fermentables.name: Wheat Malt
fermentables.usedIn: Wheat beers and adjunct for ales up to 40%of grist.

yeasts.name: SafAle English Ale

hops.name: Willamette (green hops)
hops.notes: Delicate estery/blackcurrant/herbal aroma, some use to replace Fuggle, Willamette is generally perceived as a new, yet good quality aroma hop. The rub of the hops gives an estery/blackcurrant/herbal aroma that is very pleasant but can be quite strong. Some brewers have found it to be a suitable replacement for Fuggle and it also stands up admirably as an aroma variety on its own merits.
